description: Even the toughest freeriding conditions are no match for this hardshell. The Gore-Tex Pro membrane and recycled nylon outer fabric offer ultra-durable protection from storms and wet weather, while keeping things breathable for the climb. The long cut and relaxed fit ensures full freedom of movement. Complete with pockets to store your essentials. The Eiger Free Pro HS Hooded Jacket is your key to full freedom on the mountain.
name: Mammut Eiger Free Pro HS Hooded Jacket - Mens
